mapper.insert: insert into orders (id, number, status, user_id, address_book_id, order_time, pay_method, pay_status, amount, remark, phone, address, consignee, cancel_time, delivery_status, pack_amount, tableware_number, tableware_status) VALUES (#{id}, #{number}, #{status}, #{userId}, #{addressBookId},#{orderTime}, #{payMethod}, #{payStatus}, #{amount}, #{remark}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{consignee},#{cancelTime}, #{deliveryStatus}, #{packAmount}, #{tablewareNumber}, #{tablewareStatus})
